name: MASK_MAGIC_A
description: Use special abilities of all dragons

name: BLIND_KILL
description: Kill an opponent while under the influence of the ability named Flash

name: STUN_KILL
description: Kill an opponent while under the influence of the ability named Stun

name: POISON_KILL
description: Kill an opponent while under the influence of the ability named Poison Cloud

name: NUMBER_OF_CRITICAL_KILLS_10
description: Kill 10 enemy players while having critically low health

name: NUMBER_OF_CRITICAL_KILLS_100
description: Kill 100 enemy players while having critically low health

name: NUMBER_OF_CRITICAL_KILLS_500
description: Kill 500 enemy players while having critically low health

name: STRONG_WIN
description: Win the battle on last minute

name: PLAY_WITH_ALL_DRAGONS
description: Use all dragons in one battle

name: PLAY_WITH_ALL_WEAPONS_ITEMS
description: Use all weapons and supplies in one battle (a weapon is considered used if it caused a death of enemy dragon)

name: PLAY_WITH_ALL_MAGIC
description: Use special abilities of all dragons in one battle

name: PLAY_ALL_MAPS
description: Play on all maps without exiting into the menu

description: Play 10 battles on Night Desert map
